name: Stephen R. Marschner
content: Steve Marschner Steve Marschner Professor Computer Science Department Field of Applied Mathematics Field of Eletrical and Computer Engineering Associate Dean for Research Bowers College of Computing and Information Science publications research teaching contact cv home My research and teaching are in computer graphics and vision, centered around how optics and mechanics determine the appearance of materials. I got my Ph.D. from Cornell in 1998, and held research positions at HP Laboratories, Microsoft Research, and Stanford University before I rejoined Cornell in 2002. I work part-time in the Real-Time Graphics Research group at NVIDIA Research.
